lead_paragraph: Leaders Manchester City beat Swansea 3-1 to make it a perfect 10 victories under Pep Guardiola, including six in the Premier League, as they recorded their best start to a top-flight campaign.

headline.print_headline: Perfect Manchester City Eclipse United Again
headline.main: Perfect Manchester City Eclipse United Again

snippet: Leaders Manchester City beat Swansea 3-1 to make it a perfect 10 victories under Pep Guardiola, including six in the Premier League, as they recorded their best start to a top-flight campaign....
